text: [Ej pajomʙar, ʙa jod ovar] hangome ki gurūhe az çinro sūji tu firistodem, ki Qur'onro ʙişunavand, pas, cun nazdi pajomʙar huzur joftand, [ʙa jakdigar] guftand: «Xomūş ʙoşed [to ʙa ojoti Qur'on gūş faro dihem] va cun [tilovataş] ʙa pojon rasid, nazdi qavmi xud ʙozgaştand, to ʙa onon [dar mavridi avoqiʙi sarpecī az farmoni haq] huşdor dihand
